movies.title: The Great Escape
movies.plot: The Nazis, exasperated at the number of escapes from their prison camps by a relatively small number of Allied prisoners, relocate them to a high-security 'escape-proof' camp to sit out the remainder of the war. Undaunted, the prisoners plan one of the most ambitious escape attempts of World War II. Based on a true story.
movies.awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 2 wins & 10 nominations.
